fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title of the page. This is used to display the title in the CMS

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the heading field will be used.

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the first 160 characters of the description field will be used.

fields.name: isActive
fields.label: Is Active
fields.description: If active, the case will be displayed on the website.

fields.name: isShowcased
fields.label: Is Showcased
fields.description: If showcased, the case will be displayed on the homepage.

fields.name: showcaseOrder
fields.label: Showcase Order
fields.description: Use only if the case is showcased. The order in which the cases are displayed on the homepage. Lower numbers come first.

fields.name: mainImage
fields.label: Main Image
fields.description: The main image of the project.

fields.name: optionalBlocks
fields.label: Optional Blocks
fields.description: Use these blocks to add additional content to the project page.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 16.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 9.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
